body.description: Two decades into their journey as ritualistic black metal conjurers, Wolves in the Throne Room have emerged from the forest with Primordial Arcana, their most majestic album to date, and their first release via Relapse Records. Primordial Arcana is the band's first completely self-contained work: In addition to composition and performance, brothers Aaron and Nathan Weaver alongside guitarist Kody Keyworth handled all aspects of recording, producing and mixing at their own Owl Lodge Studios in the woods of Washington state. The album's title is a reference to the band's ongoing reach back to the most ancient, archetypal energies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Top of their game
reviews.reviewText: If you’re already familiar, then WITTR need no introduction. You’re most likely a fan and need no further encouragement to pick this one up. Just do it, you won’t regret it. WITTR take Thrice Woven to the next level.If you’re new and are curious, this album is a good entry point. It’s well crafted and shows them at the top of their game. It should be enough to entice you into checking out their back catalogue and discovering their unique place in American Black Metal. While you’re at it, check em out live…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Another great album
reviews.reviewText: Wolves in the throne room never disappoints. A lot of the riffs on this album remind me of something emperor would have done in the early 90s. Great album they absolutely killed it, very well done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Long awaited album. Unfortunately the CD was smeared with a scented oil or moisturizer that even permeated the sealed plastic wrapping on the CD case. The inner booklet and case needed to be cleaned as everything smelled like almonds

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best US "Black metal " band

reviews.reviewText: El vinilir en color dorado es onírico. La música de Wolves in the Throne Room sublime, trascendental.

Primeiro vinil que compro direto da Amazon, mesmo com muito receio por comentários de outros compradores, mas tive que aproveitar a oportunidade pelo bom preço do produto.Vinil importado dos EUA, chegou rápido, em menos de 20 dias, e muito bem embalado. Esta edição a venda é com apenas 1 disco (este album também foi lançado em edição dupla) e vem na cor dourada (“gold nugget”).A banda dispensa comentários. Gostaria mesmo de enaltecer que foi uma ótima experiência e que com certeza pretendo comprar novos discos na plataforma (só não entendo a diferença de preço em produtos de certa forma semelhantes, que chegam a custar mais que o dobro deste).

Shipping was fast which is now not super typical of prime shipping so that was great. Gold nugget vinyl is beautiful, thought it was gatefold but that’s on me should’ve known it wasn’t by the price point. Perfect condition though. Very satisfied.

reviews.reviewTitle: Wow was für ein Biest von Album
reviews.reviewText: Diese s heibe zieht einen einfach nur in seinen Bann, ich kann sie jedem empfehlen der auf atmosphärischen Black metal steht, ich selber finde sie Mega hammer und hat vieles was die alten norwegischen bands früher hatten in einem nur etwas moderneren Gewand,war obwohl eine normal bestellte die limitierte goldnugget Version bildet folgen die tage. Ist mir jetzt schon mehrfach passiert normal bestellt und hab dir limitierte Version bekommen, amazan ist da oft mein Überraschungsheld, verpackt wie immer super top. Dank prime eh keine Versand kosten, werde hier immer wieder bestellen, Bilder folgen die Tage

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Brilliant album thanks for such great memories
